<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}

>

Creates a new database connection string.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"databaseId","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true},{"schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"path","name":"projectId","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string"}},"required":["name"]}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
